timeline.bodyText: This sentence is a little bit odd to me. Do you mind rephrasing it?
timeline.author: ricardozanini
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -32,20 +32,19 @@ Please note the additional parameter to specify you are running the service loca
 
 ### Running with persistence enabled
 
-Kogito supports runtime persistence that is backed by Inifinispan. So to be able to enable this you need to have 
-Infinispan server installed and available over the network. By default it expects it to be at (it can be configured via application.properties file located in src/main/resources)
+Kogito supports runtime persistence that is backed by Infinispan. So to be able to enable this you need to have 
+Infinispan server installed and available over the network. By default, it expects it to be at (it can be configured via application.properties file located in src/main/resources)

timeline.bodyText: I think it is necessary to configure the authentication information, users, and groups properties to make it work with ispn11, it is worth running the docker-compose from here just to confirm.
timeline.author: tiagodolphine
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@ version: '2.1'
 services:
 
   infinispan:
-    image: infinispan/server:10.0.0.Final-1
+    image: infinispan/server:11.0.4.Final

replies.bodyText: @tiagodolphine thanks for the heads up, tested locally and seems to work just fine.
replies.author: cristianonicolai
